How to Install hime-anthy on debian

  • Home
  • debian
  • hime-anthy

Today in this tutorial, I’ll show you how you can install hime-anthy on debian with and without using the command line.

Introduction

Installing hime-anthy on debian is very easy. And with the help of this tutorial, you will be able to easily install, update and uninstall hime-anthy in just a few steps.

In this tutorial I’ll show you four methods to install hime-anthy, the methods are using apt, apt-get, aptitude, and synaptic. All these methods require you to have an active and stable internet connection and sudo permission.

Install hime-anthy Using apt

To install hime-anthy in debian using apt, you will need to run the apt update command first to get the updated list of packages from the repositories.

Copy the command given below and paste it in the command line, then press enter. If you are using the sudo command for the first time then you might also need to enter your root password.

sudo apt update

After you have updated the package list using apt, you can now install hime-anthy using the apt install command. To do that use the command given below.

sudo apt -y install hime-anthy

The installation of hime-anthy might take a little bit of time depending upon your internet connection and machine configuration.

Install hime-anthy Using apt-get

To install hime-anthy using apt-get in debian, you will need to first update the package list using the apt-get update command. Copy, paste, and enter the command given below in the command line.

sudo apt-get update

After updating the package lists, use the apt-get install command given below to install hime-anthy.

sudo apt-get -y install hime-anthy

Install hime-anthy Using Synaptic

To install hime-anthy using Synaptic you will need to first install Synaptic, you can do that by following the instructions from here. After installing synaptic follow the steps below to install hime-anthy on your debian using Synaptic.

You can open synaptic by clicking on the menu icon then searching for synaptic or you can open the command line and enter the command given below –

sudo synaptic

After synaptic opens, click on the search icon and search for hime-anthy. This will display the hime-anthy package in the package window, now to install hime-anthy, click on the checkbox that is on the left side.

Then click on Mark for Installation, this will select the hime-anthy package for installation, now to install it click on the Apply button, you will get a summary window where click on the apply button again to start the download of hime-anthy.

If the download and installation are successful then the checkmark option will turn green.

Install hime-anthy Using aptitude

To install hime-anthy on debian using aptitude, you will need to first install Aptitude in your debian. To install Aptitude follow the instructions here. Once you have aptitude installed proceed to the installation of hime-anthy.

Now you will need to first update your package lists from the repositories, use the apt update command for that, after that update the package list of aptitude using the aptitude update command.

sudo apt update sudo aptitude update

After updating the package list of aptitude, install hime-anthy using the command aptitude install hime-anthy.

sudo aptitude -y install hime-anthy

How to Upgrade hime-anthy on debian

If you want to upgrade the hime-anthy package on your debian to its latest version then here’s how you can do that using apt, apt-get, aptitude, and synaptic.

Upgrade hime-anthy using Apt & Apt-get

To upgrade hime-anthy to its latest version using apt or apt-get, you will need to open the terminal then run the sudo apt update command to update the package list, after that copy and paste the commands given below to upgrade hime-anthy.

sudo apt install --only-upgrade hime-anthy sudo apt-get install --only-upgrade hime-anthy

Upgrade hime-anthy using Aptitude

To upgrade hime-anthy using aptitude you will need to again run the update command to update the package list, use command sudo aptitude update to do that. After that run the command given below to upgrade hime-anthy.

sudo aptitude -y full-upgrade hime-anthy

Upgrade hime-anthy using Synaptic

To upgrade hime-anthy using synaptic open synaptic using the command sudo synaptic or by going to the menu and searching for synaptic.

In synaptic click on the reload button, this will look for updates. After that you will need to search for hime-anthy, now right-click hime-anthy, and click on the mark for upgrade option.

Now to upgrade hime-anthy just click on the apply button, then click on the apply button again in the summary screen.

How To Uninstall hime-anthy on debian

If you want to remove and uninstall hime-anthy from your debian then here’s how you can do that. To remove just hime-anthy, you can use the command that is given below, copy the command, paste it in the command line then press enter.

sudo apt remove hime-anthy

Remove related packages, dependencies & configuration files of hime-anthy

To remove all the related packages, dependencies and configuration files of hime-anthy you can use the command given below.

sudo apt -y purge hime-anthy

Remove hime-anthy using Synaptic Package Manager

You can also uninstall hime-anthy using the synaptic package manager, first open synaptic using the command sudo synaptic or search and open it directly.

After that in synaptic search for hime-anthy, right-click the hime-anthy package and click on the Mark for Complete Removal option. Now to uninstall hime-anthy click on the apply button then in summary click on apply again.

Conclusion

That is how you can install hime-anthy on debian using the command line or using the synaptic package manager. I also showed you how you can uninstall and upgrade hime-anthy using the command line or using the synaptic package manager.

If you need any help regarding the installation of hime-anthy then send me a mail at netmikoblog@gmail.com, thank you.
